Portfolio About&Contact
Karen is rising high school senior in New York City. She hopes to pursue architecture in the future. She is currently an intern at American & International Designs and has previously interned at Designer's Edge and Stantec.
Karen loves seeing ideas and concepts transform and come to life. In her free time, she loves drawing, painting, and learning how to code. She enjoys painting murals around the city. She is currently a Website Designer and Staff Artist at DetesterMagazine and hopes to impact others by speaking out about gender equality and environmental justice.
